thread.title: Tyme Agency Adds Full Swing Golf To Client Roster
thread.title_full: Tyme Agency Adds Full Swing Golf To Client Roster - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Tyme Agency Adds Full Swing Golf To Client Roster
text:
Tyme Agency
SAN DIEGO , Oct. 20, Tyme Agency (OTC - NBDR) is pleased to announce the addition of Full Swing Golf to its client roster. Full Swing Golf is a San Diego based company specializing in cutting edge golf simulation technology.
Full Swing Golf will be utilizing Tyme Agency's services to implement the company's social media marketing efforts.
"I am really excited to add Full Swing Golf to our client roster. They have such an amazing product and are working on new technology and products that give this company amazing upside. It's also very cool to see them embrace social media the way they have this year and we will be working together to create engaging and educational content that will create buzz and increase their social following," says Jason Fierro CEO, Tyme Agency.
"Given Jason's background in both sports and digital technology, it was an easy choice for us to team up with Tyme Agency. He will work with our team to develop a social media strategy that will give us more interaction with customers while increasing our audience across all social platforms," says Ryan Dotters CEO, Full Swing Golf.
About Full Swing Golf
Full Swing Golf is a San Diego based company specializing in cutting edge golf simulation technology. The technology features state of the art ball tracking and offers clients 93 Championship Courses. Full Swing Golf, found in over 60 countries worldwide which optimizes the player's experience with its real time environment. The technology can be found in the home of PGA TOUR Players including Jordan Spieth , Ian Poulter , Bill Haas , Hunter Mahan , Mark Wilson and Tiger Woods.
About Tyme Agency:
Tyme Agency is a boutique sports marketing agency, offering customized consulting packages tailored to fit any brand, team or athlete. Built on sixteen years of sales, marketing and consulting experience, Tyme specializes in athlete/team representation, loyalty program management, business consulting and social media strategy. Tyme Agency is a subsidiary of No Borders, Inc.
For inquiries please contact Jason Fierro :
P. 858-900-8989
E. marketing@thetyme.com
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/tyme-agency-adds-full-swing-golf-to-client-roster-300163028.html
